    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.inductors \textit{(package)}!reliafree.inductors.coil \textit{(module)}!reliafree.inductors.coil.Coil \textit{(class)}|(}
\section{Class reliafree.inductors.coil.Coil}

    \label{reliafree:inductors:coil:Coil}
\begin{tabular}{cccccc}
% Line for reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor, linespec=[False]
\multicolumn{2}{r}{\settowidth{\BCL}{reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor}\multirow{2}{\BCL}{reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor}}
&&
  \\\cline{3-3}
  &&\multicolumn{1}{c|}{}
&&
  \\
&&\multicolumn{2}{l}{\textbf{reliafree.inductors.coil.Coil}}
\end{tabular}

Coil Component Class. Covers specifications MIL-C-15305 and MIL-C-39010.

Hazard Rate Models:

\begin{enumerate}

\setlength{\parskip}{0.5ex}
  \item MIL-HDBK-217F, section 11.2

\end{enumerate}

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Initializes the Coil Component Class.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      Overrides: reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor.\_\_init\_\_

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{create\_reliability\_inputs}(\textit{self}, \textit{part}, \textit{layout})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Populates the RelKit Workbook calculation input tab with the widgets
    needed to select inputs for Coil Component Class prediction 
    calculations.

    Keyword Arguments: part   -- the RelKit COMPONENT object. layout -- 
    the layout widget to contain the display widgets.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      Overrides: reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor.create\_reliability\_inputs

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{create\_reliability\_outputs}(\textit{self}, \textit{part}, \textit{layout})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Populates the RelKit Workbook calculation results tab with the 
    widgets to display Coil Component Class calculation results.

    Keyword Arguments: part   -- the RelKit COMPONENT object. layout -- 
    the layout widget to contain the display widgets.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      Overrides: reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor.create\_reliability\_outputs

    \end{boxedminipage}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Loads the RelKit Workbook calculation input widgets with calculation
    input information.

    Keyword Arguments: part -- the RelKit COMPONENT object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
      Overrides: reliafree.inductors.inductor.Inductor.load\_reliability\_inputs

    Component Class.
